title: Comemrcial Bunglow
details:
Walking distance to the kandy Town ,Temple of the tooth ,10 meters to the Bus stop ,two way entrance Steps or the road to the door step
28 perches with 10 Large rooms, with a anex (With three rooms Seperate Income)
peaceful environment facing the udawaththa kale forest & overlooking knuckles mountain range ( Could be Easily Converted to a tourist Bungalow)
